Justworks | http://www.justworks.com | NYC NY ONSITE only

We're looking for engineers to help build out tools to help small businesses and startups run their companies. Think of us as a company back office as a service. Currently we do payroll, benefits administration (health, dental, vision, 401k, disability etc), compliance (EPLI, workers comp etc.), tax filing, as well as standard HRIS stuff like vacation tracking, document storage etc. Our goal is to give small business access to the same tools that large businesses have.

Beyond being technically proficient, we are looking for people who want to be involved in the creation of a strong engineering culture. We are an engineering focused company (our CEO is an engineer and helped build a lot of our stack).

We've just raised a $13mm series B from Thrive, Index and Bain Capital Ventures and are growing extremely quickly. Please feel free to reach out to me (contact info in profile) if you have any questions about the position.

We are also hiring in design and product.
